casebody.data:
No. 20,

Misc.

Smith v. United States. Frederic A. Johnson and Rudolph Lion Zalowitz for petitioner. Solicitor General Griswold, Assistant Attorney General Vinson, Beatrice Rosenberg, and Edward Fenig for the United States.

C. A. 2d Cir. Certiorari denied.

Mr. Justice Douglas is of the opinion that certiorari should be granted.
